about_us.title: About Us
about_us.intro1: At Ayamku Food, we believe food isn’t just about flavor — it’s about feeling at home. Born right here in Brunei, Ayamku started with one mission: to serve crispy, juicy, flavorful chicken that brings people together. From humble beginnings, we’ve grown into a beloved local favorite, known for quality ingredients, bold flavors, and warm service.
about_us.intro2: We take pride in blending traditional tastes with modern convenience, offering meals that satisfy every craving — from quick snacks to hearty family feasts.

locally_inspired.title: Locally Inspired
locally_inspired.text: Our recipes are crafted with a Bruneian touch and a love for homegrown flavor.

fresh_fast.title: Fresh & Fast
fresh_fast.text: Every order is prepared fresh and served fast, whether you’re dining in or ordering online.

always_evolving.title: Always Evolving
always_evolving.text: We constantly introduce new dishes, promotions, and seasonal specials to keep things exciting.

about_us.mission_text: To serve food that’s flavorful, affordable, and full of heart, while staying connected to our roots and community.
about_us.vision_text: To become Brunei’s most trusted name in fast-casual dining — known for exceptional taste, authentic service, and a strong community connection.

contact.title: Let's talk with us
contact.subtitle: Questions, comments, or suggestions? Simply fill in the form and we'll be in touch shortly.
